welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Juan, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city known for its stunning beaches, delicious local cuisine, and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that San Juan has to offer.

restaurants.name: Patucannay's Best
restaurants.description: Patucannay's Best is a soup spot located in Bangued.

restaurants.name: ENJB Panciteria
restaurants.description: ENJB Panciteria is a soup spot located in Lagangilang.

restaurants.name: Kuya Dee-Ar Pnctn
restaurants.description: Kuya Dee-Ar Pnctn is a noodle restaurant located in Tayum.

restaurants.name: Max’s Restaurant
restaurants.description: Max’s Restaurant is a filipino restaurant located in Bangued.

restaurants.name: Scituate Pub and Bistro
restaurants.description: Scituate Pub and Bistro is a restaurant located in Bangued.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it is mainly used by Philippine Airlines for its international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal, serving mostly international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, it is now used for budget airlines and some domestic flights.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device, with option to purchase additional hours.
